content:
The Google cloud storage used by llvm-bisect is no longer active: https://lists.llvm.org/pipermail/llvm-dev/2021-July/151623.html

Does anyone know of a way to bisect LLVM builds that doesn't require rebuilding it locally for each commit?
manual/local bisects of llvm are somewhat less painful than rustc fwiw. but I would still grab a hefty cloud vm for this personally.
it's also helpful to enable ccache or similar, since bisecting may bounce back-and-forth over major changes
